data.title: AI: Late 2026 will be inflection point for these hyperscalers
data.description: Nvidia (NVDA) announced a $2 billion investment in chip software manufacturer Synopsys (SNPS), while OpenAI (OPAI.PVT) takes an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings and strikes a deal to be Accenture's (ACN) primary artificial intelligence partner. Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Semiconductor Analyst Kunjan Sobhani chats with Allie Canal about the AI trade in the context of "circular investing" concerns and his outlook on which hyperscalers may have opportunities to pull ahead of the competition in 2026. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
